workflow.title: Variant Annotation with VEP (Variant Effect Predictor) from GATK .gvcf files
workflow.description: Here, from a list of g.vcf files, we execute GenotypeGVCFs command line GenotypeGVCFs perform joint genotyping on gVCF files produced by HaplotypeCallerVariant Effect Predictorhttp://www.ensembl.org/info/docs/tools/vep/script/index.htmlThe VEP determines the effect of your variants (SNPs, insertions, deletions, CNVs or structural variants) on genes, transcripts, and protein sequence, as well as regulatory regions.
